properties.title: Historic Severe Hazard Exposure
properties.description: This dataset quantifies the historical exposure of crops and livestock to climate hazards, expressed in nominal USD value of production (VOP). It is generated by multiplying crop- or animal-specific hazard risk raster stacks by their corresponding exposure layers, The data represent hazard exposure rather than impact, showing the value of production exposed to specific hazards across administrative levels. Importantly, the dataset distinguishes between individual hazards (e.g., drought or heat alone) and compound hazard interactions (e.g., simultaneous dry and wet conditions in the same season), recognizing that a crop may show minimal exposure to a single hazard but significant exposure when multiple hazards coincide - which is often more consequential to production.
properties.atlas_llm:sql_instructions: Do not filter on timeframe, scenario, severity, or model. Ignore the exposure_unit and exposure_var fields, they are fixed.When filtering for countries, always use the ISO3c code first. Fallback to admin0_name if needed, but some names have special characters. If admin1_name is NULL, the data is at admin0 level. If admin2_name is NULL, the data is at admin2 level. If admin2_name is not NULL, the data is at admin2 level.

table:columns.name: iso3
table:columns.description: The ISO3 character code for the country.

table:columns.name: admin1_name
table:columns.description: The name of the admin1 region (i.e. state or province).

table:columns.name: admin2_name
table:columns.description: The name of the admin2 region (i.e. city or municipality).

table:columns.name: gaul0_code
table:columns.description: The GAUL (Global Administrative Unit Layers) numeric code for the country.

table:columns.name: gaul1_code
table:columns.description: The GAUL numeric code for the admin1 region.

table:columns.name: gaul2_code
table:columns.description: The GAUL numeric code for the admin2 region.

table:columns.name: value
table:columns.description: Numeric value corresponding to the crop exposed to a specific hazard(s).

table:columns.name: scenario
table:columns.description: The SSP of the model represented in the record (always historic).

table:columns.name: model
table:columns.description: Name of the model represented in the record (always historic).

table:columns.name: timeframe
table:columns.description: The timeframe of the model represented in the record (always historic).

table:columns.name: hazard
table:columns.description: Common name of the hazard(s) represented by hazard_vars.

table:columns.name: hazard_vars
table:columns.description: The variable(s) of the hazard represented in the record.

table:columns.name: severity
table:columns.description: The severity of the hazard represented in the record. (always severe).

table:columns.name: exposure_var
table:columns.description: The exposure variable exposed to the hazard (always vop).

table:columns.name: exposure_unit
table:columns.description: The unit of the exposure variable (always usd15).
